heading: HJR0014
0: JOINT RESOLUTION TO INCREASE THE COMBAT DUTY PAY OF OFFICERS AND ENLISTED PERSONNEL OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES (AFP) FROM A MINIMUM OF FIVE PER CENTUM (5%) TO A MAXIMUM OF TWENTY-FIVE PER CENTUM (25%) OF THE BASE PAY OF A PRIVATE AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act JR00001 enacted on 2018-01-01 Consolidated into HJR0018
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HJR0014
FULL TITLE : JOINT RESOLUTION TO INCREASE THE COMBAT DUTY PAY OF OFFICERS AND ENLISTED PERSONNEL OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES (AFP) FROM A MINIMUM OF FIVE PER CENTUM (5%) TO A MAXIMUM OF TWENTY-FIVE PER CENTUM (25%) OF THE BASE PAY OF A PRIVATE AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-08-03
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-11-28
      2. Approved by the Committee on 2017-11-28
          -House Joint Resolution No. 18 in consolidation with House Bills Numbered 1325, 1350, 1465, 1701, House Resolution No. 1459 and House Joint Resolution Numbered 14, 16, 17 and 19 was approved without amendment.
      3. Committee Report Approved on 2017-11-28
      4. Committee Report filed on 2017-12-05
MOTHER BILL: HJR0018
CONSOLIDATED WITH: HB01325, HB01350, HB01465, HB01701, HJR0016, HJR0017, HJR0019, HR01459
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2017-08-09
